Package eutros.multiblocktweaker.crafttweaker.functions

Functions that can be implemented to change the behaviour of a multiblock.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ICompleteRecipeFunction
    Called every time a recipe completes.
    IDisplayTextFunction
    Called when adding text to the multiblock UI.
    IFormStructureFunction
    Called when the multiblock is formed.
    IRecipePredicate
    Called before a recipe is chosen.
    IRemovalFunction
    Called when the controller block is about to be removed.
    ISetupRecipeFunction
    Called whenever the worktable sets up for a new recipe.
    IUpdateFunction
    Called every time the worktable updates.
    IUpdateWorktableFunction
    A function run when the worktable is updated, that is, every tick.

Package eutros.multiblocktweaker.crafttweaker.functions Description

Functions that can be implemented to change the behaviour of a multiblock.
